scripts.build-web: cd web && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.deployBranch: powershell cdk deploy --context stackId=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)
scripts.destroyBranch: powershell cdk destroy --context stackId=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)
scripts.buildDeployBranch: npm run build && npm run build-web && npm run deployBranch
scripts.buildDeployBranchandOpen: npm run bdb && npm run open
